summary: A suicidal and rebellious teenager is sent to live with her grandparents for the summer, where life takes an unexpected turn.

Robertson|William Fowle|Will MacAdam|Gil Deeble|Mark Havlis|Frank Rodriguez|Tim Gallin|Linton Alfred|Daniel Lee Robertson III|Jason Acuna|John Farrer|Mike Hurt|Robert Oppel|Paul Thornton
title: Greta
